title: LF normal folks to play with xD
body:
I often add/accept randoms I've played with, but just as often remove them from my friends list because they easily rage, flame others, troll etc etc.

I play for fun, not for trophies or ego boosting. I'm average skill level/game knowledge, and I always try to win, but don't care for a loss either way. I'm in this game for the laughs and entertainment value it provides. I ignore and will steer away from toxic or unstable people.

If you fit this bill exactly please add me, I wanna game with similar kind xD
I play most nights after 7pm(ish) usually norms but happy to do aram/ranked all the same if that's the vibe you're putting down. Have 3 RL friends I commonly queue with but they are not always available, so i need some more chill peeps to play with <3

So... {{champion:32}} wanna be my friend?

replies.body: Aye, hit me up for some norms dude. Got skype too for chatting. Sloths rule!
sounds like the kind of person i wanna play with!! il add u tomorrow? :^)
Yee I'm keen, will add you now. Probably will be playing tonight, might see you then ^_^
